block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold this Flying Witch designed by Kunihiko Kasahara. You could also use it as an origami wizard. It is the perfect origami decoration for Halloween. Try it out, I hope you like it. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel
